body_html:
@bddppq it is related to "merge" branch. The email notification came in as:

@bddppq pushed 24 commits.

ad99ef7 Several minor fixes for Windows build (#6332)
b348376 [auto] Update onnx to c9f825f - Refine a little bit about op spec. (#666)
cbcae2f fix activation images not showing up on official website (#6367)
95a34da refactor reduce arg to _Loss superclass (#6371)
fe6c75d Fix typos in docs (#6389)
09ca86d Fix the c2-onnx exporter bug on Gemm (#6331)
2d204ef add cuda headers (#6401)
93d2ec4 Increase margin for CPU perf test, and change test order (#6363)
379d091 fix incorrect error message in convolution_expand_param_if_needed (#6409)
a708cd0 Add total_length option to pad_packed_sequence (#6327)
7ad6c58 [pytorch] add static linkage support for CuDNN and NCCL (#6410)
94b0a25 Using a function registry for THD init_methods for easy extension (#6334)
49e74d6 Another CUDA 8 fix for Windows (#6383)
fa72eac Add mock python module for testing (#6387)
915d4d1 Check mappings ONNX -> Caffe2 bear the same argument names (#6317)
50ea1fa Use string comparison in OS check (#6420)
30df5c3 [pytorch] Fix clamp is missing kwarg out (#6028) (#6418)
63f4374 Fixes #6386, Use copies instead of symbolic files (#6396)
2fe8ec1 bottleneck supports better user-provided arguments (#6425)
2fec4ec fix typo in link to sigmoid activation image (#6429)
629619c [caffe2] Support fused Conv+Relu with NNPACK (#6375)
7ac177e [auto] Update onnx to 20bcb8b - Fix the spec for batchnorm and instancenorm (#733)
8164e17 Add different logo for master docs (#6446)
eaada54 FC shape inference doesn't need the bias term

body:
@bddppq it is related to "merge" branch. The email notification came in as:

```
@bddppq pushed 24 commits.

ad99ef7 Several minor fixes for Windows build (#6332)
b348376 [auto] Update onnx to c9f825f - Refine a little bit about op spec. (#666)
cbcae2f fix activation images not showing up on official website (#6367)
95a34da refactor reduce arg to _Loss superclass (#6371)
fe6c75d Fix typos in docs (#6389)
09ca86d Fix the c2-onnx exporter bug on Gemm (#6331)
2d204ef add cuda headers (#6401)
93d2ec4 Increase margin for CPU perf test, and change test order (#6363)
379d091 fix incorrect error message in convolution_expand_param_if_needed (#6409)
a708cd0 Add total_length option to pad_packed_sequence (#6327)
7ad6c58 [pytorch] add static linkage support for CuDNN and NCCL (#6410)
94b0a25 Using a function registry for THD init_methods for easy extension (#6334)
49e74d6 Another CUDA 8 fix for Windows (#6383)
fa72eac Add mock python module for testing (#6387)
915d4d1 Check mappings ONNX -> Caffe2 bear the same argument names (#6317)
50ea1fa Use string comparison in OS check (#6420)
30df5c3 [pytorch] Fix clamp is missing kwarg out (#6028) (#6418)
63f4374 Fixes #6386, Use copies instead of symbolic files (#6396)
2fe8ec1 bottleneck supports better user-provided arguments (#6425)
2fec4ec fix typo in link to sigmoid activation image (#6429)
629619c [caffe2] Support fused Conv+Relu with NNPACK (#6375)
7ac177e [auto] Update onnx to 20bcb8b - Fix the spec for batchnorm and instancenorm (#733)
8164e17 Add different logo for master docs (#6446)
eaada54 FC shape inference doesn't need the bias term
```
